title: Google Analytics Data API v1beta - PropertyQuota Type
description: Current state of a property's quota usage

tokensPerDay.description: Standard Analytics Properties can use up to 200,000 tokens per day

tokensPerHour.description: Standard Analytics Properties can use up to 40,000 tokens per hour

concurrentRequests.description: Standard Analytics Properties can send up to 10 concurrent requests

serverErrorsPerProjectPerHour.description: Standard Analytics Properties can use up to 10% of their tokens per project per hour

potentiallyThresholdedRequestsPerHour.description: Analytics Properties can use up to 120 requests per hour

metadata.description: Represents quota usage for a Google Analytics property
